title: allow swagger oauth config at runtime
body:
### Description

Swagger UI allows to integrate API with oAuth/OpenID AUTH mechanisms. Works absolutely fine without any issues.

Challenge is most of the config is Build Time. This is limiting the use of Swagger UI. 

e.g. 
If we consider below setup, TenantId and ClientId will be different based on where we run the application. Because the config is build time, it doesn't allow us to set clientId and token/auth url's at runtime. 

### Setup:
Provider: Azure AD

Organisation have 2 tenants. Which means 2 App registrations and as a result separate client/tenant id's.

- Tenant A: Used for Testing purposes only
- Tenant B: Used for production only

### Implementation ideas

Allow Client Id/Secret and Auth/Token URl's to be configurable at runtime.
